liber_application.controller

Class GenreController

  • java.lang.Object
    • liber_application.controller.GenreController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/genres")
public class GenreController
extends java.lang.Object
    The REST controller for genre. Because the class has only one field (which is id also), no updates can currently be made to an existing genre If change of genre is wanted, a new genre must be created, and books altered to this new genre.
    Author:
    Valter Ekholm

public java.lang.String addGenre(@PathVariable
                                                                   java.lang.String name)
        Add a genre by use of url
        Parameters:

      • addGenreREST

        @PostMapping(path="/add")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Genre> addGenreREST(@RequestBody
                                                                                              java.lang.String name)
        Add genre by use of Request body
        Parameters:
        name - - a String
        Returns:
        a ResponseEntity and if the genre allready exists HttpStatus.ALREADY_REPORTED, else the new genre and HttpStatus.CREATED

      • deleteGenre

        @PostMapping(path="/delete/{name}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Genre> deleteGenre(@PathVariable
                                                                                                       java.lang.String name)
        Delete a genre post by name
        Parameters:
        name - - a String
        Returns:
        a ResponseEntity and if was deleted HttpStatus.OK, else if not found HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND, else HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR
